name: Venice Bridges
description:
Venice is under attack by malicious Plague Doctors and you have been chosen to come to its rescue.
Plunge into the world of Venice Bridges, a 3D puzzle adventure game where the beauty of Venice meets hardship and destruction.
Save Venice by luring the Plague Doctors and their squad to their demise, and solve puzzles to restore Venice to its glory.

name: Story of Mine Company
description: Hire miners and help them extract ore using different tools. Try to control the chaos of the workflow. Manage resources wisely to stay profitable. Trade in the market. Craft items. Improve your base.

name: Mecha Knights: Nightmare - Operation Ascalon Expansion
description: Echo Team will be sent on a dangerous mission deep behind enemy lines. Uncover a new chapter in the game's story, featuring seven missions and a new tier of advanced parts and weapons.

name: Labyrinth of Rage
description: Enter the Labyrinth... at your own demise.

name: Amusement Park Simulator
description: This is a simulation-tycoon game for making your dream park.You can purchase , sell and move all of the machines and visual items.While you do these things costumers comes and experience all of this.Sometimes they wanna eat , watch and enjoy on machines.Becareful if they buy a ticket !

name: Into the Dungeon
description: Into the Dungeon challenges heroes to annihilate the evil skeleton necromancer before he destroys the world! Play solo or co-op with up to 4 players in this fast paced chaotic card battler.

name: Gore Doctor
description: Gore Doctor is an immersive horror game set to unleash spine-chilling thrills on PC. You find yourself in the institute of a tormented doctor who, driven by desperation after losing his wife, descends into madness and becomes convinced that death is the only respite.

name: Momo and the Mine
description: Help this charismatic mole collect matchsticks in an abandoned mine in this challenging platform game!

name: Princess Peach: Showtime!
description:
The wicked Grape and the Sour Bunch have taken over the Sparkle Theater, and now it's up to Peach and the theater's guardian Stella to save the play––and the day!

Peach can transform and use fantastic showstopping abilities to face off against the Sour Bunch.

Fend off the Sour Bunch with sensational swordplay as a swordfighter...en garde! In another role, Peach puts on her detective hat to find out whodunnit in a museum mystery. From kung fu master to pastry chef, Peach’s roles give you distinctly powerful ways to save the play!

name: TerraTech Worlds
description: TerraTech Worlds is an open-world, PvE survival game set on distant alien planets. Build, explore and craft—solo or via online co-op—to harness the power of uncharted worlds. Discover untold wonders, conquer natural hazards, establish epic bases and battle enemies as you build your way to victory!

name: There's Always a Madman: Fight or Flight
description: Step into the shoes of the suave secret agent Franklin Benjamin in this single-player spy thriller interactive novel. Drive fast cars, seduce beautiful women, and do whatever it takes to save the day against impossible odds. Because there's always a madman, and you're the best agent we've got!

name: Barold: Inferno
description: "Barold: Inferno" is an action-packed dungeon crawler game where you play as the knight Barold, fighting demons and gods in the depths of hell using different weapons and abilities.

name: A Game Called Paako
description: A Game Called Paako is a pixel-art 2D platformer metagame that tells the story of a game major grad student named Chaoran making his thesis game project A Game Called Paako.

name: Mike's Garden
description:
Mike is in trouble! His garden is growing out of control and needs your help. Match species, use tools creatively and chain incredible combos to survive as long as you can!

Make your game unique! Earn seeds each game to unlock new species in your own private Greenhouse.

Unlock different common, or crazy, garden management tools to keep control of your board.

The only way to win is to become the King of the Garden in the Garden of Fame. Beat your friends by mastering your strategy and never sharing your gardening tips and tricks.

name: Emil: A Hero's Journey
description: As Nazi forces take his father, equipped only with his imagination and creativity, Emil goes on a journey to find him. Emil: A Hero's Journey is a Cinematic Puzzle-Platformer, combining intense action and creative puzzle solving. inspired by actual testimonies that took place during WW2.

name: Multi Maze 3D
description: Get ready for the ultimate ball collecting experience that will keep you hooked for hours!

name: 4D Golf
description: Explore higher dimensions... with golf! With different visualizations, game modes, and a level editor, you'll gain a hands-on understanding of the 4th dimension and beyond.

name: Rise of the Ronin
description: Rise of the Rōnin is a combat focused open-world action RPG that takes place in Japan at a time of great change. It is the very end of a 300-year long Edo Period, commonly known as “Bakumatsu”. Set in the late 19th century, Japan is facing the darkest of times as it struggles with its oppressive rulers and deadly diseases while western influence permeates as civil war continues to rage between the Tokugawa Shogunate and the Anti-Shogunate factions.

name: Chill Town
description: A sequel of Chill Corner - a combination of relaxing simulation and idle game. Listening to beautiful music while decorating the room, fishing, cooking or even keeping it in background while doing your real life activities.

name: Escape: Site-13
description: Escape is a platform-adventure game of new weird style. You will be in an uncontrollable research institution, and witness the site being disintegrated by Data Elimination. Seek a gleam of light desperately in the erosion of the darkness.

name: Rise of the Overlords
description: Rise of the Overlords is a combination of TCG and war board games, bringing new depth and giving new strategies to the players. Place your units wisely and take advantage of the battlefield to defeat your opponents. Who will be the Supreme Overlord that will rule the world? A new era begins!

name: Bears In Space
description: Unleash your inner bear in this over-the-top bullet-hell FPS! Embark on a zany retro-futuristic adventure and destroy oil-thirsty robots with an outrageous arsenal. Transform into a bear, wield unique powers, and embrace the absurd fast-paced action of Bears in Space!

name: Reverse Collapse: Code Name Bakery
description:
Reverse Collapse: Code Name Bakery is a tactical turn based role-playing game. Set in the near future, Earth has plunged into the "Second Cold War", a world war in which two factions – the emerging Antarctic Union and the old guard UURSG – battle for dominance over cutting-edge technology that can turn the tide of war.

An improved remake of the Tactical RPG "Code Name: Bakery Girl", the story is set 30 years after the events of Girls' Frontline.

name: Dragon's Dogma II
description:
Dragon's Dogma is a single player, narrative driven action-RPG that challenges players to choose their own experience – from the appearance of their Arisen, their vocation, their party, how to approach different situations and more.

On your journey, you’ll be joined by Pawns, mysterious otherworldly beings, in an adventure so unique you will feel as if accompanied by other players while on your own adventure.

All of these elements are elevated further by the latest in graphics, artificial intelligence (AI) and physics technology to create a truly immersive fantasy world in Dragon's Dogma 2.

name: Maimai DX Buddies Plus
description:
Maimai DX Buddies Plus is an upgraded version of Maimai DX Buddies for arcade.

General Information / Changes
maimile shop & Weekly Mission introduced. Completing Weekly Missions will reward you maimile, which can be used for items in the maimile shop.
- This makes maimai BUDDiES PLUS the first game in the series to use the maimile currency since ORANGE PLUS.
- maimile shop can be used inside maimaiでらっくすNET.

New progress tickets introduced that can be purchased at the maimile shop:
- Weekly Area progress 2x ticket (ウィークリーちほー進行2倍チケット), which doubles the distance multiplier on the Area. Only one ticket can be purchased/owned a week.
- Tour Member level up 5x ticket (つあメンレベルアップ5倍チケット), which quintuples the level up rate of tour members.

Favorites can now be chosen for songs on the song results screen by pressing a button. Up to 30 songs can be added.
- This function can only be used on songs you have unlocked.

Album page now shows the location where the picture is taken, a save button, and also a disclaimer of the photo.

Favorite and random selection functions have been added to Collections. Up to 30 of each type of Collection item can be saved as favorites.

When playing with someone who's not your friend on the same cabinet, a friend registration screen will be displayed after the name entry screen. If you select "yes", you will instantly become friends. This feature on the website is called friends on the spot (その場でフレンド).
- This will not display if either player has set their settings to skip friend registration.

When performing a rating color change effect, the effect screen will be retained until a certain amount of time passes, or until the "Skip" button is pressed.

By touching the rival score display area, you can temporarily hide your rival's score.

English notation added to various UI.

name: My Love 2
description: You choose the plot here. No crystals and tickets! Choices are equally important as they don’t cost crystals.

name: Game of Vampires: Twilight Sun
description: Live as a vampire lord in Game of Vampires, an epic and enigmatic RPG saga! Take Dracula's castle, sit on the throne and rule over a secret kingdom filled with famous vampires, werewolves, and witches. Meet powerful and handsome immortals, make alliances with other vampires, and clash with fairytale monsters! You are the lord of twilight... so what will you do in the shadows?

name: Cogito Ergo Sum
description: You, your world, your vassals, and your domain are all the dream of gods from beyond the heavens. In the midst of these interlopers' visits you have woken up, and been cursed with the knowledge of the true nature of your reality.

name: Anime Thighs: 18+ Content
description: Unleash the power of Anime Thighs!

name: GOKA Street
description: Now, who are you? A striker unstoppable, a defense like a wall, a goalie of impossible saves?! Just follow the call and climb up the career ladders, GOKA Street challenges you!

name: Gay Sex Adventures: Episode 6
description: An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD GRAPHICS and realistic-looking characters. Tony needs a personal assistant to help with the business during the day and warm his bed at night. The interview with the two potential candidates turns into a hot menage with a lot of fisting involved.

name: Conqueror's Blade: Battle Pass - Dragonrise
description: Play Conqueror’s Blade: Dragonrise to unlock 100+ levels of exclusive dynastic rewards, including Hero Attire, weapon skins, and much more!

name: Quickerflak 2
description: Quickerflak 2 is a retro-hardcore room-beater time-attack super fast-paced minigame.

name: Akuyaku Reijou ha Ringoku no Outaishi ni Dekiai Sareru
description: Sin descripción

name: Cazzarion: Ghost Frenzy
description: Collect Gems in a mine but avoid the ghosts and the bombs!

name: Ambitious Mission
description: Sin descripción

name: Wizard with a Gun: Bounty Edition
description: Wizard with a Gun: Bounty Edition bundles the base game with the Gunmancer Pack and Bounty Hunter Pack.

name: Final Fantasy XIV Online: Starter Edition
description: While having the same name as another edition, this updated package contains the first two expansions rather than only the first expansion.

name: Childhood's Rush
description: An easy-to-play 3D rogue-lite TPS action game that you can enjoy in just a hour!

name: Gunvolt Records Cychronicle: Song Pack 5
description:
Add 4 Lumen and Joule tracks from the Azure Striker Gunvolt series to GUNVOLT RECORDS: Cychronicle!

This song pack adds the tracks "Sakura Efflorescence", "Tabula Rasa" and "Reincarnation Fateful" for Lumen along with "Cyanotype" for Joule.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Highway 35 World Race Pack
description: Straight from the movie Highway 35 World Race, 4 spectacular racing cars that will make the competition tremble even before starting their engines. 24/Seven, Power Pistons, Sling Shot and Vulture: add these extraordinary 4-wheeled masterpieces to your collection!

name: Ikonei Island: Spring Tide Content Pack
description: Embrace the delightful spirit of spring with the Spring Tide Content Pack! Let your imagination bloom with a collection of seasonal decorations and items inspired by the renewal of nature. Transform your island hideaway and infuse your home with springtime wonder!

name: Ikonei Island: Lystide Content Pack
description: Missed out on the Lystide event items? This pack lets you buy all the exclusive decorations and items to spruce up your island with festive cheer! Deck out your island in style with holiday-themed decor and make it a winter wonderland to remember!

name: Ikonei Island: Lunar Union Festival Content Pack
description: Missed the Lunar Union Festival? This content pack has you covered! Deck out your island with the exclusive Lunar New Year decorations and items. Purchase now and relive the festival's magic!

name: Shadows Unveiled: Agnes
description: "Shadows Unveiled: Agnes" is an immersive horror game where you explore an ancient abandoned apartment, uncovering dark secrets and facing unimaginable horrors as you seek the truth behind the disturbing events.

name: Zeitz Machz: Rhapsody
description: A strange location, an awkward situation, and a mysterious girl: what will these lead to?

name: Let's Roll
description: Avoid various obstacles and reach goal. It is a third-person platformer action genre. Buying skills with coins will help you reach your goal

name: Macau Midnight Madness
description: “Macau Midnight Madness” is a Romantic Comedy Yuri Visual Novel and Dating Sim. Play as Mikayla as she goes to Macau to take part in a tennis exhibition game and ends up finding the woman of her dreams along the way.

name: Planetary Parfait
description: Planetary Parfait is designed to support a wide range of scientific research tasks, including geologic mapping, feature analysis, and mission planning. Includes features to support these tasks, such as 3D visualization, annotation tools, and data layers that can be overlaid onto the terrain data.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Season Pass Vol. 2
description: 2 environments where you can create your own tracks, 2 areas to add to the Hot Wheels Creature Rampage mode and 24 vehicles to win in great style: all of this is waiting for you in the Season Pass Vol. 2!

name: Age of Water: The First Voyage
description: Embark on your first adventure on a post-apocalyptic Earth completely covered in water. Sail through storms, fight and trade, capture other people's boats or build your own, extract resources from the bottom of the ocean, reveal the secrets of the Age of Water world.

name: Petit Petit Petit: DLC 2 - Specter Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: They Always Run: Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition includes: - They Always Run - Audio Artbook (Arts from They Always Run)

name: Season Match Bundle
description: Enter the magical world of Season Match!

name: Across the Obelisk: Starter Set
description: Get the best possible start to your journey with the Starter Set! This essential bundle brings together the Across the Obelisk base game and the acclaimed expansion Sands of Ulminin accompanied by the hero pack featuring Amelia, the Queen.

name: Cynthia: Hidden in the Moonshadow - Deluxe Edition
description: Emotional, 3rd-person, story-driven, adventure game focused on solving puzzles and using stealth mechanics. Use your bow to interact with environmental elements. Sneak, climb or distract guards to move further unnoticed. Solve light puzzles alongside your path to rescue your loved one.

name: Finding America: The West - Collector's Edition
description: Explore the West and uncover its hidden gems through the excitement of finding fun objects.

name: Puzzle Vacations: Greece And Turkey - Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Puzzle Vacations: Thailand and Cambodia
description: Sin descripción

name: Just Find It 2: Collector's Edition
description: New puzzles, new challenges!

name: Arcade Archives: Surprise Attack
description: " SURPRISE ATTACK " is an action game released by KONAMI in 1990. Recover the space station, shuttle, and moon base from the forces of " BLACK DAWN ", an international terrorist group that threatens the universe. The stage is cleared when all the bombs in the stage are recovered and the final location is reached. After defeating the stage's boss, there is a bonus quiz, and if you answer correctly, you will receive bonus points.

name: In Tent to Kill!
description: Detective Johnson must solve the murder of a juggler by interviewing suspects and solving the puzzle.

name: Sylvie RPG: 7 Elf Apocalypse
description:
In a strange world beset by ruin, a woman named Sylvie appears to fight battles.
What will you find in this world?

Sylvie RPG is a 49x49 resolution action RPG with bump-style action combat.

name: Largo
description: Become a security camera operator and survey creepy environments, spot the differences and report anomalies.

name: Galactic Counselors
description: In this sci-fi strategy game, the Solar System of 4,000 A.D. is ravaged by wars between humanity's planetary colonies. These wars are directed by Supremes - the autocrat leaders of the planets. But each leader needs an advisor, and this is where you step in. Can you guide your ruler to victory?

name: Anime Thighs
description: Who doesn't like Anime Thighs?

name: Greenland
description: Greenland is a strategic turn-based survival game. Choose your tribe and fight to survive rival factions and the harsh and shifting conditions of Greenland. Become a friendly hunter and gatherer or a gruesome raider, the tribes fate is in your hands.

name: Neanderthal
description: Humanity's evolution as a species has accelerated over the last 30,000-40,000 years unparalleled in evolution of life on Earth. What triggered this change? Play as the Archaic Man (Player Green), Neanderthal (Player Yellow), or Cro-Magnon (Player Red) species fighting to survive .

name: Hentai Girls Panic
description: Classic casual arcade game in puzzle style.

name: Western Frontier
description: An action shooter in which Billy, an assassin, fights in the frontier days of the West!

name: Sector 98
description: Bzzt Bzzt! SECTOR failure! Some robots were infected after a cyber attack on the lab's main system. It's impossible to remove the virus, We have to destroy these robots, I know it's not nice to destroy your friends, but..

name: Sushi Shot Online
description:
Aim your sushi and shoot!
Battle against players from all over the world!

name: Aha! Let's Photo Hunt!
description: Sin descripción

name: Remington, the A.I.
description: A kinetic (linear) visual novel about the world's top Artificial Intelligence (A.I.) competing to be NO.1 -- one made by the United States government and the other by a private European company.

name: Let's Kill This Guy With Hammers!!!
description: You heard the title right! This is my life story- an arena game where you kill GUYS with HAMEMRS. It's as shrimple as that! Freaking GET TO IT! My wife is dead. Avenger her.

name: Keep The House Warm
description: Your task is to keep the house warm by carrying wood chips to the heater. Brave the cold, engage in ice fishing for survival and see how long you can endure the cold challenge!

name: Shinseikatsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Winterclaw
description: Winterclaw is an immersive dark fantasy sim with an in-depth companion. Discover the fire within and survive the cold.

name: Hentai Tales: Mysterious Clinic
description: There is a clinic in a back alley in this city that claims to be able to cure all ailments, and do so in a pleasant way. You heard rumors and came to this clinic. What will happen there?

name: Room
description: When I woke up, I was in a small room. Escape through the endless rooms.

name: Sneaky Snacks
description: Take the role of a chef who has been given the task to cook the kings royal feast. There is only one problem... The snacks are missing! Embark on a hidden object journey where you must find over 20 different snacks across 20 medieval style levels while not running out of time!

name: Guerra Civil
description: You are the Commander of Revolutionaries. Manage your Revolutionaries. Resist the Fascist invasion! Change the history (in a good way)

name: Fernbus Simulator: Poland
description: Discover the beauty of Poland in this DLC for the Fernbus Simulator! As one of the largest countries in Central Europe, Poland borders Germany in the west and offers a variety of cultural experiences as well as various landscapes.

name: Air Traffic Sim: Airport Dispatcher Simulator
description: Welcome to airport controller simulator! You are airport administrator and you need build a route for the flight of the airplane and land the airplane on the airfield!

name: Special Forces Strike: Tactical Swat Shooter
description: Take on the role of a secret agent specializing in anti-terrorism operations in an exciting first person shooter!

name: Soda Scuffle
description: A survivor game. The items in life suddenly mutate, and you will control the soda that gains special abilities to defeat one monster after another to maintain peace. Rely on your movements to avoid enemy barrage. Pick up experience to upgrade, defeat all bosses you encounter, and you will win.

name: VirtualBuster
description: "Virtual Buster is an action-adventure game where you take out robot criminals with swords and guns in a realistic virtual reality (VR) world. Players use special weapons and missions of varying difficulty to emerge as city heroes and demonstrate strategy."

name: Craft Lands
description: Let's develop the village! Craft Lands is a development simulation game where you plant trees in a vast empty space and develop a village. Defend your village from enemies and use resources to build houses and increase your population. What kind of village you create is entirely up to you.

name: Up & Down
description: Navigate through a limitless survival challenge, "Jump or Fly" to avoid the never-ending obstacles to beat your personal high score in an unlimited and exhilarating gaming experience!

name: Panzer Corps 2: Frontlines - Bulge
description: Bulge introduces players to the first downloadable content, immersing them in a dynamic and engaging narrative battlefield that unfolds during the epic Battle of the Bulge, starting a few days before the fateful date of December 16th, 1944

name: My Cute Roommate Irene
description: Are you feeling stressed? Don't worry. Serene is here to help you

name: Pull The Pin: Ball Physic Puzzle
description: Classic physics based puzzle - color the balls and fill the glass with colored balls while avoiding obstacles!

name: Overworked Alice
description: This is a precise platform game modeled after the King of Jumps.

name: Prank Heart
description: Phantom Theif vs. Detective slapstick online battle action!!! Enjoy lively and funny PvP with multiple items such as Rocket launcher, Invisibility cloak, Bananas, Soccer ball bomb!

name: Paper Dash: City Hustle
description: Start an adventure as a courageous paper plane hunts evil ghosts across vibrant worlds. Soar through mystical forests and scary mansions, utilizing your flying skills and reflexes to shoot the ghosts.

name: Expansion
description: VR real-time strategy blending action, exploration, and decision-making. Command high-tech base, elite squads, and ferocious units for intense warfare, testing your intelligence and maneuvering skills.

name: On the Run: Rogue Heroes
description: Gain strange abilities and evade enemy forces as you uncover a conspiracy! What will you do to learn the truth? Will you fight for others or save yourself?

name: Broken Lands: Tower Defense
description: Get ready for an epic journey to defend Broken Lands against hordes of goblins, dwarves, elves and other nasty fiends using a vast arsenal of towers and spells! Fight on deserts, seas, forests and mountains, customizing your defensive strategy with different tower upgrades and specializations!

name: Trust No One
description: You'll need to think outside more than just the box. In "Trust No One,” a point-and-click detective adventure, you play as a journalist who tries to unravel a web of secrets about a mysterious AI-company. Explore the nooks and alleyways of Kyiv to discover the identity of your informant.

name: Lunar's Chosen
description: Lunar's Chosen is a story heavy adult visual novel. Play as the main character through a story filled with sex, mystery, magic and beautiful women.

name: Max Mustard
description: Max Mustard is a made-for-VR platformer with 40 unique levels, 4 ridiculous bosses and 8 powerful upgrades. No boring bits! It’s the perfect combination of first-person power-ups and classic third-person platforming. This is a VR platformer you’ll find impossible to put down.

name: TaxingTiles
description: Shape your realm. Conquer chaos. Unveil mysteries. Deck-building roguelike fun!

name: Dragon Quest X: All In One Package - Versions 1-7
description: A new all-in-one package including versions 1 to 7 of Dragon Quest X Online.

name: Dampf: The Cozy Tower Defense
description: Cozy tower defense meets stylistic futuristic steampunk. Manage resources, buildings & towers. Unlock perks to further specialize yourself. Plan your defense & survive all enemy waves.

name: Luminous
description: Shadow vs Light - Who will emerge victorious?

name: JAPP: Just Another Precise Platformer
description: A mouse only 2D precise plateformer who will challenge you.

name: Sushi Battle Rambunctiously
description: "Sushi Battle Rambunctiously" is a comical physics-based action battle royale party game where appetizing sushi, created by combining various types of 'shari' and 'tane', engages in fierce combat alongside zombified sushi to survive until the end.

name: Gas Station Simulator: Tidal Wave DLC
description: In a tropical island paradise owned by the god-like active volcano, Chunchumanchu, players embark on a unique adventure inspired by Robinson Crusoe. Starting near the coast, they discover an abandoned Gas Station.

name: Wildlands Resurgence
description: section for a game where players need to survive from both other players and wildlife, mine resources, craft items and structures, and even form tribes:

name: Turbo Tails
description: Animals are flocking to see the annual Turbo Tails Tournament! Pick your animal racer, navigate diverse locations, devour treats to unleash turbo power, outwit rivals and savor the thrill of a racing adventure like no other!

name: Dragon Quest X: Mirai he no Tobira to Madoromi no Shoujo Online
description: This is the sixth major expansion for Dragon Quest X, known as Version 7, which will feature a new story, new characters, a new area called Zenias, and the new master vocation Dragon Mage.

name: Esports Heroes
description: Become a pro esports athlete, scrim to improve, team up with four other players, and reach the top of professional esports. Become a legend in this first-ever idle RPG in the world of pro esports!

name: AI.Cybercraft
description: Join the battle for humanity's survival in AI Cybercraft, an action-packed sci-fi space combat game! Lead a team of skilled pilots as you engage in epic battles against AI robots, using advanced weaponry and cutting-edge technology. Your decisions will determine the fate of the human race.

name: Stunt Paradise
description: Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled ride in Stunt Paradise! Take on epic challenges, perform insane stunts, and experience extreme driving. Buckle up and play now!

name: Kakuriyo Village: Moratorium of Adolescence
description: Ao & Hinori were both childhood sweethearts and accidentally went to a strange world called Kakuriyo Village. Because of her boyish appearance, the villagers mistakenly thought Hinori was a boy... Can they successfully hide Hinori's genders and escape from the village!?

name: Sinners Landing
description: Sinners Landing is an adult-themed, romance-based, dungeon crawling RPG with a card-style battle mechanic. Explore dungeons, slay monsters, get loot, and romance the women of the local town.

name: Extraction Force
description: Nuclear launch codes have been stolen! Invade the enemy base. Destroy everything in your path. Locate the stolen codes and return them safely to prevent the end of the world.

name: Call of Duty: Warzone Mobile
description: Call of Duty: Warzone Mobile is ushering in the next era of Call of Duty franchise with the highest quality Battle Royale mobile game experience, featuring authentic Call of Duty: Warzone style combat, weapons, movement and vehicles.

name: HappyFunland
description: Explore the abandoned remains and uncover the dark secrets of Mort Grisly's HappyFunland theme park, Home of Randy Rodent! A darkly comedic VR horror experience where the fun never dies!

name: Parry Nightmare
description: As a Soul, you, the player, will team up with Honno and survive this Nightmare! Parry the enemy attacks, fill up your gauge, and destroy your enemies in a sweep! The way you evolve your partner Honno would be the key strategy to break through this Nightmare!

name: Thunder Helix
description: Pilot deadly helicopter gunships, battle enemy forces and complete dangerous missions within a thrilling desert warzone!

name: Krimson
description: Krimson is a challenging gritty rhythm platformer featuring heavy electronic metal music. You're an unknown spawn moving through a hellish world as it shifts rhythmically to the music. One wrong move means death but the checkpoints are often, and death is very short.

name: Krum: Battle Arena
description: On the arena rules are simple - bring your name and your country in front of everybody else! It is a fun, competitive, asynchronous, hack and slash, parody game.

name: BattleJuice Alchemist
description: BattleJuice Alchemist is a singleplayer RPG combining classic top-down combat with third person bullet time. Explore a dark procedural world, learn ritual magic, solve riddles, craft alchemical potions and combine them in deck-building-like fashion to fight the demons overrunning the lands.

name: Fida Puti Samurai
description: Fida Puti Samurai is a retro-FPS "virtual happy place" set inside a virtual simulated world, the simulation is jeopardized with a naughty bug. Traverse this action-oriented roguelite blasting waifus on procedural generated cities to uncover dirty secrets on someone's computer!

name: Piccadilly's Puzzle Museum
description: Join Piccadilly and her friends today and unlock the magic of Piccadilly's Puzzle Museum. Dive into a world where imagination knows no bounds, and every puzzle piece is a piece of art waiting to be discovered. Are you ready to embark on this delightful puzzle adventure?

name: Midnight Ghost Hunt
description: A chaotic multiplayer hide-and-seek game. Possess seemingly harmless objects as Ghosts or chase them down as Hunters before the clock strikes midnight!

name: AntiAir
description:
To clear the level, you must destroy all the UFOs while avoiding falling bombs and blocks.

Blocks cannot be destroyed by your own bullets, but will disappear if hit by an enemy bomb.

name: Machine Men
description: Machine Men is a single map with plenty of grunt set in an abandoned lava-strewn demonic foundry. The title is inspired by the Bruce Dickinson song of the same name.

name: SOVL: Deepwood Guardians
description: This is a Faction Pack for SOVL - Fantasy Warfare. It adds the Deepwood Guardians to the game.

name: Alone in the Dark: Director's Commentary Mode
description: Delve into the moments of inspiration, hurdles, and creative decisions that shaped 2024's first horror masterpiece with the exclusive Director's Commentary Mode, offered in English only.

name: Hearthstone: Whizbang's Workshop
description: The genius inventor and toymaker, Whizbang, has opened the doors of his workshop to the public! He’s got plushies, action figures, wind-up toys, Miniatures, and more. Find your new favorite toy, or build it yourself, here in Whizbang’s Workshop!

name: Airport Boss
description: Manage the passengers at your airport and guide them through all the processes like Check-in, Security, Immigration, and finally Boarding.

name: MechWarrior Online: Otomo Collection
description: The Otomo Collection comprises the finest 'Mechs the Draconis Combine offers. 6 Special Mechs with 30% C-Bill Boost Iconic Skins, Bolt-ons, and More

name: Helenenkapelle VR
description: Eine historische Reise durch die Zeit, von der Blühtezeit der Kapelle bis zum Ende als Ruine.

name: Qualle Party: Bonus Maps
description: This DLC gives you 3 more maps in the game.

name: Super Monsters Ate My Condo
description:
This remake features updated visuals alongside an expanded gameshow-inspired narrative where contestants compete to complete challenges and increase their in-game star power on the “road to stardom.”

Swipe to feed condos to monsters. Match the correct colors together and create combos to pull off insane score streaks. Feed the wrong condos to the wrong monster too many times and they will topple over your tower.

name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin - Kurdoss Valentian, The Craven King
description: Kurdoss Valentian, The Craven King Pack introduces a new playable hero to Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin for Conquest Mode and Multiplayer Mode, bolstering the Nighthaunt.

name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin - Gaunt Summoner
description: The Gaunt Summoner Pack introduces a new playable hero to Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin for Conquest Mode and Multiplayer Mode, bolstering the Disciples of Tzeentch.

name: Forza Motorsport: 2019 Toyota 86 TRD SE
description: Forza Motorsport 2019 Toyota 86 TRD SE

name: Invasion of Space
description: Invasion of Space is a 2D shooter in a distant space. Find strength to fend off waves of enemy ships and defeat Boss. Good luck on your journey!

name: Fish N Chat
description: Welcome to Fish N Chat! Feel free to take things easy and relax on the wide open lake in this low poly and 90s chatroom style horror game! Chat with the locals, explore this peaceful lake, and aim to catch the massive fish everyone keeps talking about...

name: Terraformers: New Frontiers Bundle
description: Terraformers & DLC: New Frontiers!

name: Alone in the Dark: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: A Love Letter to Horror Fans

name: Life or Reach
description: A fighting game where you can control your reach! ? During the match, in exchange for your own health You can extend the reach of your weapon! Adjust your reach and grab a new sense of victory!

name: DriftCE: Toyota Supra MK5 DLC
description: Expand your fleet by pulling in another legendary car: the Toyota Supra MK5. To make your new car unique, take it to your garage and make changes to its set-up to best suit your driving style. Overcome your limits and leave rivals in the dust!

name: OMSI 2: Download Pack Vol. 13 - AI Cars
description: The Downloadpack 13 brings the latest vehicles to OMSI 2 as AI traffic - in addition to cars with combustion engines, new electric vehicles and spacious minibuses are also included.

name: Cazzarion: Shellfish Frenzy
description: Sin descripción

name: Boom Jump
description: Sin descripción

name: Yuuki Yuuna ha Yuusha de Aru: Hanayui no Kirameki - Vol. 8
description: Sin descripción

name: Yuuki Yuuna ha Yuusha de Aru: Hanayui no Kirameki - Vol. 7
description: Sin descripción

name: Yuuki Yuuna ha Yuusha de Aru: Hanayui no Kirameki - Vol. 6
description: Sin descripción

name: Yuuki Yuuna ha Yuusha de Aru: Hanayui no Kirameki - Vol. 5
description: Sin descripción

name: Canyon Rush
description: Navigate treacherous canyons in this thrilling trap runner game, Canyon Rush! Test your reflexes, master the traps, and climb the leaderboards in an adrenaline-pumping adventure. Are you ready to conquer the canyon?

name: Hangul Shooter
description: Learn Hangul with a game. Shooting the enemies or playing a minigame with an anime character by your side. This is a fun starting point for learning Korean!

name: Bodyguard Task Force
description: Your mission is clear: go solo or team up with 3 other friends to ensure the safety of high-profile VIPs through a series of dynamic and challenging scenarios.

name: SCP: Descent
description: Inspired by SCP-087, step into the shoes of an unfortunate student long before the stairwell became legend. Follow the clues left by those who came before, your only choice is to descend.

name: WyrmBound
description: In WyrmBound, you can have thrilling fights to improve your skills, ride amazing dragons, control their abilities, and change the course of battles. Face off against legendary Asian deities and mythical creatures to bring back peace to the land.

name: Saw Lab
description: Saw Lab: Test Your Survival InstinctIn a world where every second could be your last, your fate lies in the hands of a mad genius. "Saw Lab" is not just a survival game it's a test of your mind, willpower, and ability to act under the pressure of unbearable fear.

name: Planetstar Warrior
description: Planetstar Warrior is a horizontal scroll-space shooter with numerous powerups and a gradually increasing level of difficulty. Defeat all enemies on each level to progress.

name: Decypher
description: Decypher hidden codes, with tons of exciting variants and levels

name: Prometheus Unbound
description: Prometheus Unbound is a 2D stealth platformer with graceful speed and machine-precision movement. Play as the monstrous machine-made-mortal,Anala. Use her unassuming human form to maneuver through a neo-gothic sprawl and transform into a volatile, electric form to hunt enemies.

name: DOS: Steve Pardo
description: DOS - the album, the game, by Steve Pardo. Minimalistic isometric music-driven platformer game.

name: Easter 2024 Puzzle
description: Easter 2024 Puzzle is an puzzel game with beautiful easter eggs in an stunning synthwave style. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: Easter 2024 Memory
description: Easter 2024 Memory is an casual memory game with stunning images. You have to find all of the correct pairs to complete the game. your best round will be count and always be displayed in game, to compare your rounds. try to reduce your turns every game and set up your new record.

name: John's Hell
description: Simple first person horror. Presents the fate of John Cramter, who searches for the cause of his brother's death in a warehouse purchased before his death.

name: White Redemption
description: An adventure game that can be played with a picture book feel, without text in the game.

name: Endless Halo
description: This is a military competition experience game with a super large realistic map

name: Firespike
description: How many Waves can you survive? Firespike is an wave survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements. You play an rifleman and defeat the hordes of skeletons that come each wave. Each Wave gets progressively more difficult.

name: Super Math Saga
description: Super Math Saga is an educational platformer game that combines adventure and math, designed to help players improve their math arithmetic in a fun way. Work your way through levels dodging enemies, climbing platforms, and solving math questions. Beat all the levels to face the final boss!

name: Petit Petit Petit: Specter Pack
description: For "Petit Petit Petit", downloadable contents 1 additional stage (STAGE-5) Additional character x 3 types Roka Beans Melt Mikko This pack includes the following downloadable contents

name: We Are Sup
description: Simple bra-fighting game that only uses addition! Dive into dungeons and defeat monsters in online play!

name: Deep in the Woods
description: The Deep Forest tells a classical tale of searching for family. Players will experience the changing seasons throughout the game and explore enchanting scenes depicting each season.

name: Clocked
description: Two worlds coexist, but one of them didn't exist yesterday. That's why you, an automaton, and your calculator sidekick, are looking for a way out of the Great Clock, searching for answers, but above all to find a way out of this place that's gathering dust.

name: Master Maker 3D Ultimate
description: Clear retro 3D levels or build your own in this 3D action platformer for all ages!

name: Chaos Adventure
description: Is there a back story? No... The adventure is yours to make! Pick a character, and you are dropped into the fantasy middle ages to start your journey! This game is designed for you to quickly jump right into it and begin hacking and slashing your way through!

name: The Wizard Party
description: The Wizard Party is a whimsical adventure game where all dialogue options are physics objects that interact with each other!

name: Project RyMe
description: Project RyMe is a story-focused puzzle adventure where you take on the role of a young woman investigating her father's disappearance. Use your computer hacking skills to investigate the internet and an odd, old computer to solve a mystery that deepens at every turn.

name: Alone in the Dark: Collector's Edition
description:
The Collector's Edition includes:
- “The Dark Man” - Statue 26cm / 10 inch height
- “Ostadte” - Miniature 10cm / 4 inch height
- “Derceto 1930” - Wallstickers Set
- “Do not disturb” - Doorhang
- “Glow Alone in the Dark” Steelbook
- Collector’s Edition DLC Package including: Derceto 1992 Costume Pack, Director's Commentary Mode and Vintage Horror Filter Pack
- Standard Edition game

name: CruxFlaw
description: Throw, Slash and Dash your way through enemies in this high score arcade slasher. Try to survive for as long as possible and eliminate as many enemies as you can by managing the movement of your stun orb, bounce it off enemies or walls and redirect it by slashing it.

name: Dragon Nexus
description: Engage in pulse-pounding combat that hones your abilities. Ride majestic dragons, command their powers, and turn the tide of battle. Reach for the skies and forge an unbreakable bond in a world of danger and beauty. Your destiny beckons in Dragon Nexus.

name: Cybergrid Runner
description: This is a stealth puzzle game set in a cyber city. Help the hacker infiltrate the system by manipulating the intricate 5x5 tile system. Collect powerful implant upgrades and weapons. Brace yourself for endlessly thrilling playthroughs, as each session unveils procedurally generated labyrinth.

name: Scott Whiskers in: The Search for Mr. Fumbleclaw
description: A funny Point & Click adventure for all ages, in the spirit of the classics of the genre

name: Joe Dungeon
description: Joe Dungeon is a game about calculating risks and rewards via distance on a board. It is also about managing a deck of cards and recognizing the best time to use them. The game also has a level editor that allows for sharing of levels with a code.

name: Alone in the Dark
description: Alone in the Dark presents itself as a reboot of the classic 1992 survival horror game featuring a noir-setting with horror elements and a moody atmosphere of darkness and shadows carried by terrifying visuals. The game revolves around investigating the environments for clues and solving puzzles to advance in the story, which the player can choose how much the game will help on finding these clues and where to go next. This reboot bears an interestingly similar fashion to the first games' mechanics but massively modernized and improved upon.

name: Arksync
description: Wired from the ashes of twin stick Shooters, Arksync evolves the genre with breakneck player movement and lethal enemy AI. Kill for energy to buy weapons, utilities, and upgrades; risk it all as you enter the depths of the evacuation facility. It's the only way to take this robot teddy bear home.

name: Lightyear Frontier: Supporter Pack: Pioneer Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Harmonies
description: Find the common music themes.

name: Ultimate Goomboss Challenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Quake II: Sewer Jam Volume 1
description: Sewer levels are notoriously hard to get right. That’s why Andrew Yoder set out to challenge the Quake community to come up with good sewer levels all the way back in 2019. We wanted to do the same for the Quake 2 Remaster and that resulted in this package. Featuring nine new maps, a hub level and pre-rendered cutscenes. We hope you enjoy Map-Center’s Quake 2 Sewer Jam Volume 1.

name: Ticket to Ride: Nordic Expansion
description: Discover a new tale to tell as you set off to the northern reaches of the world! Build routes between colourful Nordic cities, claim the sprawling Murmansk-Lieksa route and earn the Globetrotter bonus in the world’s favourite train adventure game!

name: Bubble Milf
description: Bubble Milf is a visual novel that puts the keys to an intriguing mysterious world in your hands. While chasing the Mysterious Desires and understanding what is going on. You will be at the top.

name: Otter’s Odyssey
description: Sin descripción

name: Shallow End
description: Discover the secrets to your brother's disappearance. Learn more about yourself and gain insights. A low rez adventure inspired by Zelda and Undertale.

name: Radiant Exodus
description:
Sarah Caldwell's casual drink at a neon-lit bar turns into a night of survival.

As mutants descend from a UFO above Gleam City,
Grab your AK47 and fight back in this adrenaline-pumping first-person shooter.

name: Train Sim World 4: London Overground Suffragette line: Gospel Oak - Barking Riverside Route Add-On
description: An Aventra Adventure awaits in Train Sim World 4! Discover North & East London boroughs aboard modern traction, traversing a newly electrified and extended line fit for future service. Become something of a driver yourself on Gospel Oak - Barking Riverside!

name: My Exit
description: Everyone is on the train heading home. You are waiting for the train to arrive at a certain station. Will you make it home safely?

name: Five Nights With Los Penguinos
description: Five Nights With Los Pinguinos is a horror game about a security guard who accidentally got a very dangerous job.

name: Grapples Galore: Cosmetics Pack 2
description: This bundle contains 5 very stylish hats and 5 (also very stylish) outfits for Grapples Galore. You Must Own Grapples Galore.

name: Grapples Galore: Hat Pack 1
description: This bundle contains 4 very stylish hats for Grapples Galore. You Must Own Grapples Galore.

name: Dinosaur Crossing: Unravel and Discover
description: Embark on a journey with these unique and daring kids as they discover a secret island and encounter dinosaurs of all kinds.

name: Cool Boarders
description: Sin descripción

name: Gods Eater Burst
description:
GODS EATER BURST is an updated version of the first title in the series, GOD EATER, featuring many improvements, new characters, and scenarios which provide even more intense high-speed battles for players to enjoy!

*This product is based on the PlayStationPortable title, GODS EATER BURST, released in 2010.
*There may be some differences from the PSP version, but these will not affect the game's progression.
*Multiplayer and exchange of avatar cards with other users are not supported in this version.
*The update distributed previously will not be released or applied to this version.

name: Jak and Daxter: The Lost Frontier
description:
A port of Jak and Daxter: The Lost Frontier, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters. The game was originally released in 2009 as the sixth and final game in the Jak and Daxter series. The player assumes the role of Jak, the angst-ridden hero enhanced by his exposure to Light and Dark Eco.

When their world begins to run out of Eco, Jak and Keira travel to the edge of the world in search of the ancient Precursor machinery that could reverse the planet's decline. They're not the only interested factions out on the Brink, however; Jak must contend with Sky Pirates while struggling to control his own Eco powers.

name: Queen of Dark
description: QoD is a third-person open-world game where you can freely explore the lands of Arzamor and fight against all kinds of dangers. The AI of the enemies offers a different experience and challenges the player in extraordinary situations.

name: No Lava
description: Control a physics-based ball and complete the course as quickly as possible without falling into Lava! (Game done in 30 minutes)

name: Star Conflict: Salamander. Weapon of Victory
description: This pack includes:Kinetic weapon “CFER-24 nailgun”.Active module “Kongmíng manual controls”Unique modifier “Horizon System Event-24”Unique modifier “Adaptive polarizer Salamander”60 monocrystalsA set of resources for 50 ores: (Vanadium + Silicon + Graphite + Osmium) + 50 Crystal shards.

name: Qualle Party
description: Qualle Party is a virtual 3D board game in the world of Qualle where you must win, but it won't be easy...

name: Grand Soul Saga
description: You are a refugee, recently landed in the turbulent city-state of DuPont and seeking passage to the distant port of Yerdan where your family waits. Get lost in a mature JRPG adventure featuring an immersive world, character-driven narrative, stirring original soundtrack, and tough battle system.

name: Space Star: Heart of a Soldier
description: A Sci-Fi Space Shooter RPG game with a small story. Get into ship and fly through space to learn what happened to your best friend. Destroy enemies and collect minerals to earn coin.

name: Gears Story
description: A mechanic and a prisoner's extraordinary tale. A simple novel game with minigames.

name: Mystic Pillars: Remastered
description: Mystic Pillars is a blend of intriguing puzzles and an immersive storyline set in Ancient India. The game is a reimagination of the Indian traditional board game - "Ali Guli Mane" or the Internationally known variant "Mancala".

name: Arc TCG
description: ARC TCG is a 3D fantasy card game. Build your deck and challenge other players in battles full of surprises. Play smart and crush your opponents with powerful abilities. This game is inspired by more successful TCG titles, but adapted to offer new game strategies.

name: Three Kingdoms: The Blood Moon
description: Three Kingdoms: The Blood Moon is a turn-based Roguelike card game where you assume the role of a Shu general. Explore dungeons, gather relics, and amass a collection of cards. In each round, you can assemble a unique combination of cards and treasures to defeat your enemies and rewrite history!

name: Stray Shot
description: Monsters come from missed shots! Learn the monster's behaviours, shoot wisely and balance the difficulty to maximize scoring!

name: Eldabyss
description: A fast-paced, bloody, gothic, and stylish platformer video game about saving the mortal realm from the wrath of Hell's armies.

name: Froggo's Adventure: Verdant Venture
description: A Simple and Bite-sized retro 2D Platformer about a frog on another side-scrolling adventure

name: Back to the Earth
description: Take an exciting journey. Find out the reason for your abduction. Help your space brothers. Alien adventures await you!

name: Splash Carnival
description: Spash Carnival is roguelike shooting game featuring paintball weapons. Arm yourself with diverse low-durability weapons, splash the enemies and move forward! Welcome to the Splash Camival~!

name: FourPoint: Prologue
description: Escaping while doing the right thing for each place in four places.Escape this place with items needed for the place, items that will help, and items that will allow you to do the right thing for the places!

name: The Darkness Below
description: Embark on an epic journey into "The Darkness Below", a homage to the golden era of 90's cRPGs, with grid-based movement, turn-based combat and 2.5D perspective. Wander a vast and colorful fantasy world filled with puzzles, exotic creatures, forgotten dungeons and ancient guardians.

name: The Liminal Space
description: "The Liminal Space" is a thrilling horror adventure game. Explore surreal landscapes, solve puzzles, and escape from terrifying monsters. Are you ready to face the challenges? Enter "The Liminal Space" now!

name: Hues
description: Move sprites slices and destroy color blocks.

name: Brick Breaker Pro
description: Brick Breaker Pro offers classic arcade fun with a modern twist! Break bricks, set high scores, and unlock achievements in this vibrant and addictive game.

name: Dark Color
description: This is a casual game where players use directional keys to control character movement

name: Cubethon
description: This is a puzzle game

name: Black Zork
description: A super fun map treasure hunt game

name: Quester Osaka
description: A dungeon exploration RPG specializing in hack-and-slash. The game is full of challenging elements. There are 32 characters (8 classes), skills to enjoy combos, modifiable armaments, "New Game+" to enjoy playing around, etc.

name: Wathan Games
description: "Wathan Games" is designed to build bridges between streamers and their viewers, turning every game into an opportunity to strengthen community bonds.

name: MLB The Show 24
description: Swing for the fences, experience game-deciding moments, become a legend and live out your baseball dreams in MLB The Show 24. Earn your call up from the minors to the big leagues and prove you’ve got what it takes at the top. Learn about known and unsung legends of the sport and take inspiration from their heroics. Hold your nerve when it matters and earn the right to be called World Series champions.

name: Lead: Rally
description: Feel the wind on your face as you strap on your helmet. The beauty of the hills ahead is deceptive; every turn could make or break your championship dreams. As the engine roars to life, you know that only your skills can pave the road to success. Welcome to LEAD – Rally.

name: Operator Ace's Simple Infinite Survival
description: O.A.S.I.S is a simple wave based Zombie survival shooter, that combines the best elements of classic arcade-style shooters with the atmosphere of an alternate 80's dystopian world. Just relax and Have some fun, Solo or with up to 3 friends.

name: Dark Mirror
description: "Dark Mirror" provides a visually stunning and atmospheric experience. The dark and gloomy environments attract players to a deep world of mystery, while the sound design of the game also increases the tension and excitement.

name: Necroslayer
description: Necroslayer is a dark fantasy styled, open world roguelite game. Play as one of several characters unlocked through the story, in first person action combat, with meta progression to improve stats and survivability each play through.

name: Drift Abyss
description: Drift Abyss is a VR experience where you can fly with your arms, climb with your fists, and discover unique landscapes in this procedurally generated planet.

name: God Within VR
description: "God Within VR" invites you into a riveting VR journey of destiny and mastery. Discover your true identity while battling formidable foes across diverse arenas. With a vast array of weapons and challenges, dive in, sharpen your abilities, and ascend in "God Within VR".

name: 2x4 Nails
description: You are FBI Field Photographer Thomas Greene, fighting and documenting the crimes of a German serial killer known to the press as "Der Kannibale".

name: Midnight Scenes: A Safe Place
description: Phil's life has crumbled to dust. The four walls of his room have become his safe haven. He yearns for sleep... but terrible nightmares haunt him. Welcome to a new dimension of horror. Welcome to Midnight Scenes.

name: World of Grimm
description: A fast-paced 5-minute digital collectible card game in the Brothers Grimm universe.

name: Serafina's Saga: Awakened
description: In this otome-style visual novel, journey from the depths of the jungle to the royal halls of Castle Krondolee. Young Serafina must uncover the dark secrets of her past and choose whom to trust in this dramatic adventure of romance and intrigue.

name: Raw Metal
description: Infiltrate the depths of an exoplanet mining facility to scavenge for gear and challenge a corrupt megacorporation. Utilize gadgets and equipment in high-stakes stealth, and hone your fighting skills in breakneck combat in this stylish stealth-action dungeon crawler.

name: KinnikuNeko: Super Muscle Cat
description: A cat with the body of a bodybuilder fights against aliens in this 2D platformer with anime aesthetics.

name: Phantom Tides
description: Set your course and explore a variety of environments on the seas in Phantom Tides. Battle various enemies and bosses as you collect items to help you on your journey. This 2D style platformer will challenge your skills and wit.

name: Lightyear Frontier
description: Lightyear Frontier is an open-world farming exploration game with crafting, resource management and base building. Play 1-4 players in online co-op, discover and grow alien plants, domesticate wildlife, endure the elements and build your new home away from home.

name: Hostia me acabo de acordar de lo que he soñao hoy, que puta paranoia
description:
What could Juan have dreamed this time? Find out in this frenetic roguelike!

Travel through 8 scenarios, face different enemies using the weapons you find and try to reach the end of this adventure.

name: IlloScape: Into the Illoverse
description:
Hello!, this is my project for the "IlloJam 2024", the objective of this Jam was to make a game within a period of "1 Month" for Illojuan, so the game focuses on its lore.

It is a small "roguelite" Arcade game which begins while you are sleeping and you hear a voice telling you that Masi (your girlfriend) has disappeared, you must overcome 4 Worlds with their respective enemies and bosses to reach her.

name: Illo Somnium Rapid Eye
description:
Colonel Andrew has assigned agent John Salchichón of the "Delta" team the mission of rescuing General Mark, who was held hostage by the terrorist organization calling itself "Alpha", to this day the leader or team leaders.

You must infiltrate the organization's operations castle and rescue the target alive, our intelligence has reported that the team has been doing cloning experiments, possibly, their army is made up of clones of their best soldiers, you must be cautious.

name: La pesadilla de Illojuan
description: Game made for Illojam, the jam of the Illojuan community.

name: Onírillo
description:
Accompany IlloJuan in one of his many dreams without any explanation. What will be the goal of this dream? Where does everything really happen? Is it really all a dream? All these and many more questions will or will not be answered in this adventure created by BlotYolo Games.

Enter the dream world and discover its deepest secrets!

Created for IlloJam.

name: Metal Pear
description:
YOUTUBE HEADQUARTERS is the name of a highly armed office in the depths of FUENGIROLA where MASI is held captive by LMDSHOW. It is the mission of ILLOJUAN, one of the members of the PATXINGARS secret army, to follow KNEKRO's instructions and infiltrate YOUTUBE HEADQUARTERS to defeat LMDSHOW and rescue MASI. FORWARD ILLOJUAN!"

Game made for IlloJam 2024

name: Kiss in Hell
description:
Steamy dreams that continue every night, and the dangerous yet tempting man who appears in them… Waking up from another unspeakable secret dream, with a flushed face, what unfolds is a weird mansion?!

Thrown amongst various demon lords each bubbling with desire, can you survive their world?

name: Trans-Siberian Legends: Beautiful Girls
description: This DLC adds beautiful girls to passenger cars.

name: Trans-Siberian Legends: Ekaterinburg
description: This DLC adds the city of Yekaterinburg and its railway station to the game. On your way along the Trans-Siberian Railway you stop in Yekaterinburg to stroll around the city.

name: Monster Never Cry
description: Sin descripción

name: Brick Mini Golf
description: Golf with a brick in procedurally generated courses that change every day.

name: Boomerang RPG
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Golf: Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CFR Modernised Doubledecker Pack No. 2
description: Manufactured in 1988/89 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Romania, and many have been modernised. This pack features 6 versions of these cars with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CFR Calatori Bmee 26-16 096
description: Manufactured in 1988/89 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Romania, and many have been modernised. This pack features 1 version of these modernised cars, PBR textures, and more!

name: Trans-Siberian Legends: Posters in a Train Compartment
description: The DLC adds beautiful posters with the theme of the Trans-Siberian Railway to the compartment car of the train. There will be a total of 3 posters in the carriage.

name: Wars Across The World: Namibia 1915
description: Namibia 1915 is the story of the Allied conquest of the German colony of South West Africa (Namibia) between 1914 and 1915. The South African and British armies will try to seize enemy zones as quickly as possible. The Germans shall try to hold on with their weak forces, relying on Boer uprisings.

name: Star Realms: High Alert - Invasion
description: High Alert: Invasion adds 8 more ships and bases to your Trade Deck. Four of them have Double Ally abilities! This expansion also includes Chapter 26 of the campaign, with 7 new missions.

name: The MisAdventures of Xenos: Legacy Edition
description: Explore the origins of 'The MisAdventures of Xenos' with this Legacy Edition DLC. A blend of nostalgia and new, it brings the classic RPG Maker VX Ace version to life with enhancements for veterans and newcomers alike.

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Extended Edition
description: The Extended Edition contains the Police Simulator: Patrol Officers game and the Garage Bundle.

name: Game of Life: Time
description: See the trajectory of Conway's Game of Life through time in a 3D perspective. Create cells, destroy cells, randomly generate cells, and observe the evolution of cell groups on the timeline!

name: Grr Boo I
description: GRR BOO i est un plateformer 2D. Il se distingue par ses graphismes enfantins, mais ne vous y trompez pas, la difficulté est trop grande pour des enfants.

name: Satellite Engineer
description: The artificial satellite with interrupted power supply needs repair. Let's navigate the space platform and collect the parts. If possible, challenge the mission with minimal movement to conserve energy.

name: Limp Heroes+
description: Limp Heroes+ is an action game in which players control a physically-driven hero to battle an army of evil villains. Using attractive characters with a touch of American Comics, players can challenge fierce battles with simple controls that require only jumping and special attacks.

name: Trans-Siberian Legends: Novosibirsk
description: This DLC adds the city of Novosibirsk and its railway station to the game. On your way along the Trans-Siberian Railway you stop in Novosibirsk to stroll around the city.

name: Fruit Mountain
description: Fruit Mountain is a 3D physics puzzle game where you stack fruits. Combine fruits of the same kind to make them bigger and bigger! Stack them up without overflowing the plate and create your own Fruit Mountain!

name: Galactic Ascendancy
description: Humanity, having mastered faster-than-light travel, discovered a distant galaxy teeming with extraterrestrial civilizations. Join Admiral Preen in his conquest of the Andromeda Galaxy. Crush the resistance and invade their worlds.

name: The Immemorial Order
description: After living in your new house for a few months, you discover the previous owners have left behind some items that were never meant to be found.

name: Breaking Bound
description: You will start on a simple and relaxing 2D platforming adventure, treasure hunt and monster upgrades, traditional character development, unique skill upgrades, and grow from a novice to a master. Give it a try.

name: AfroCobra
description: A side scrolling action love letter to Kung Fu Master / Spartan X. Jump, dodge, and kick your way through a flood of increasingly challenging enemies and stage bosses.

name: The Vault
description: A quick view into another world through the eyes of a single console.

name: Unlock
description: A group of passwords in front of you, with no way forward. Impossible to solve.

name: Trans-Siberian Legends
description: A first-person adventure game with a storyline. You are about to travel on a passenger train along the Trans-Siberian Railway. You can look out the window and observe the change in nature, weather and architecture. You can see forests, fields, mountains, cities and villages.

name: Forest of Perdition
description: "Forest of Perdition" is a horror and mystery game that plunges players into a tranquil park, progressively transformed by supernatural events. Each step forward is a step closer to the terrifying truth that awaits at the heart of this haunted forest.

name: Lonely Knight
description: Lonely Knight is a game that combines idle and roguelike elements. Defeat monsters and embark on a journey to find companions for the lonely knight. Experience growth through idle gameplay and test your strength in dungeons!

name: Mucorales
description: An enthralling RPG Maker horror game that explores a dark and twisted rendition of the classic fairy tale, Red Riding Hood.

name: Bingle Bingle
description: Bingle Bingle is a 'Roulette Builder' game where you can create your own Roulette. Strategically combine various betting options and unique balls to create synergies, earn extreme scores, and beat the casino

name: The Last Commander
description: You are the last remaining commander. Grow your sector well and protect Earth from invading alien spaceships for 50 days. Build the best building combination on the hexagonal terrain.

name: Alchemy Deck
description: Alchemy Deck is an alchemy-themed card game that makes making potions fun. Take orders or create unique recipes. Collect and process ingredients and brew your potions. If you encounter threats, challenge them! Your goal is to find the philosopher's stone. Good luck!

name: Pesticide Not Required
description: Mow down countless crops and corrupt critters while crafting game-breaking builds! Pesticide Not Required is a bullet heaven, horde survival roguelite with farming elements that offers a myriad of stats and special character traits to create wildly diverse run possibilities.

name: The Necromancer Cometh!
description: The Necromancer Cometh is a tower defense game with a focus on mazing, fun characters, and interesting abilities. Build towers with special abilities, upgrade them to more powerful levels, create your maze through interesting maps, and survive wave after wave of enemies with unique powers!

name: Unsung Ballads
description: In this indie story-driven RPG deck-builder, embark on an exciting adventure of epic proportions, inspired by the rich folklore of south-eastern Europe.

name: Massive Defense
description: A Science-Fantasy tower defense game. Challenging bosses are waiting for you. If you lose a tower you also lose ring and place for a tower. Strategize your way to victory with the ultimate tower and placement composition.

name: After the Flood
description: Five local teenagers have gone missing from Prairieville, Louisiana. The town is in an uproar. In this first-person survival horror game, play as Detective May Samson, sent to help find these missing kids. Investigate to piece together the story and learn the dark truth behind this simple town.

name: Street Shuffle
description: Street Shuffle is a strategic card game with a focus on a party member system and combinations of different classes of cards, all set in an urban neighborhood with elements of street performance and hip hop.

name: Half Built: Casino
description: Half Built: Casino is the ultimate casino tycoon game. Start from scratch and build your dream casino. Take loans from the mob to keep growing but don't miss a payment! A world-class legitimate enterprise or a seedy backroom game room? The choice is yours with Half Built: Casino!

name: Wanagiri
description: Wanagiri is a short visual novel where you play as Kamila, who accidentally isekai'ed to an uncompleted book that your friend wrote. How will you end the story, and will you be back there again someday?

name: Jigoku Train
description:
Waking up to an unfamiliar place, what course of action will you choose?

Play as Ling, your average office worker having her usual shifts and living her usual life, woke up on the train one night, finding that she was not going to head to her usual destinations.

Not only that, you will also play another character! He wakes up with no memories on a train heading towards an unknown location. Grant is your average amnesiac guy.

Where are they heading, and what can they do in order to head back home? Or is there even any way home?

name: The Blue Pendrive
description: This is a fan-made adaptation of a story written by ‪Sinuois‬, called "El Pendrive Azul" or "El USB Azul"

name: Evil Returns
description: Evil Returns is a 32-map megawad. There ﻿are various styles of maps including various themes such as easy maps, small, medium & large maps, puzzle maps, a couple joke maps, slaughter style, high-contrast, hell-themed, tech base, and even a hotel-themed map.

name: Friday Night Funkin': vs. Gorefield
description: After 2 long years, the story of Jon and Bf vs. Gorefield continues, with better quality and content. An adventure full of terrors and enigmas awaits you, a renewed mod that quadruples the content of the first version!

name: Pipunka the Jumper
description: Sin descripción

name: Golden Goal: Soccer Squad
description: Sin descripción

name: R Drive
description:
Pedal to the metal, and turn the wheel to the right and... to the right!?

Looks like your car has a few technical issues, and the wheel can't turn left! Keep on moving, avoid obstacles and collect coins to speed up! Each coin will throw another obstacle so be careful... but hey, at least the brakes work!

You'll score by picking up coins and moving at high speeds! The faster, the more each coin's worth, but don't be afraid to hit the brakes if things get too hectic. However, if your speed reduces to 0 or you hit a wall or obstacle, you'll lose!

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach - Ruin 2
description: You will meet many different mechanics on your way. You will need to turn on generators & escape from animatronics, and so more easter eggs to the original game.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: CFR Calatori Bmee 26-16 096
description: Manufactured in 1988/89 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Romania, and many have been modernised. This pack features 1 version of these modernised cars, PBR textures, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: CFR Modernised Doubledecker Pack No. 2
description: Manufactured in 1988/89 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Romania, and many have been modernised. This pack features 6 versions of these cars with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

name: Trainz Plus: CFR Modernised Doubledecker Pack No. 2
description: Manufactured in 1988/89 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Romania, and many have been modernised. This pack features 6 versions of these cars with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

name: Trainz Plus: CFR Calatori Bmee 26-16 096
description: Manufactured in 1988/89 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Romania, and many have been modernised. This pack features 1 version of these modernised cars, PBR textures, and more!

name: Solitary Mark
description: This is a casual puzzle game that is very simple and easy to understand, suitable for players of all ages. Players need to eliminate blocks of the same color or shape by clicking on them, or swap positions to connect them into three or more patterns. Each elimination earns points, and special items can also be used. The game interface is simple and beautiful, with smooth operation, exquisite graphics, and cheerful music, but it will not make you feel tired while you are crazy.

name: Blue Rain
description: This is a casual game with a beautiful appearance in the game background.

name: Cursed Order
description: Indie story-rich RPG game in a world where humor and mystery intertwine.

name: The Consumist Journey
description: The Consumist Journey is a surreal exploration game where you play as a strange character on a quest to explore the capitalist and consumerist paradigms of modern society. Navigate through bizarre and nonsensical environments, solve puzzles, and interact with eccentric characters.

name: Eye on the world
description: "Eye on the world" is an exploration adventure game where you will find various objects in a voxel diorama. Let's dive into the world of exploration!

name: ClickeRogue
description: Slay enemies using clicks, spells and get stronger by leveling up in endless dungeons !

name: Edenfall
description: Edenfall is the next instalment to the Seraphim Slum universe. Playing the previous game is recommended, but not required to understand Edenfall.

name: May Your Memory Be a Blessing
description:
In the Armenian Orthodox church, it's said that a person's soul wanders the earth for 40 days after they die.
This story is in memory of our father, who passed away 39 days ago.

name: Doons
description:
Blow up sand dunes (doons) with your cannon!

Note the color of the doon loaded into your cannon, then use the joystick to position your cannon above the doons you want to clear, and press the trigger to shoot your doon. If you shoot your doon into doons of the same color, the doons will explode. Every now and then, a color-changing bomb will appear to the left of the playfield. If you move the cannon next to the bomb and shoot, it will explode all of the doons of the matching color. Keep playing until the doons overwhelm you!

name: Perika Game
description:
Perika Game is a puzzle and collectibles game where your ingenuity will be your est ally. Will you be able to overcome the challenge and get all the fruits?

Inspired (obviously) by Suika Game, this project arose for the IlloJam convened mainly for members of the community of the well-known spanish-speaking streamer IlloJuan.

name: Stars Collapse
description:
The game tells the story of a young man named "Sunam", who gets trapped in the Stars Park place on his first day working there.

A virus has taken control of the restaurant, unleashing chaos and putting our protagonist in a lot of danger from familiar faces, who will take the role of our animatronic killers.

All of this while he discovers the truth of the death of one of the founders, years ago...

name: Wake Me Up If You Need Me
description: Sin descripción

name: Hydrangea
description: Hydrangea is a romance and psychological horror visual novel inspired by the Hanahaki disease trope. You play as someone whose sweetheart, customizable to your preferences, falls ill with a mysterious condition just as you reconsider ending the relationship. Drawn closer by their plight, you find yourself navigating a love that deepens into obsession, where affection takes a dark turn and the petals of devotion threaten to suffocate.

name: Granola Jumps
description: Sin descripción

name: Jello Run
description: Wobble your way to victory!

name: Mirror Sided
description: Sin descripción

name: Nyakamon
description: Help NyaKaMon to get through challenging levels of sokoban!

name: Terraformers + Starward Rogue: Mechs and Colonizers Deluxe Bundle
description: Colonize Red Planet or fight in a mech - Mechs and Colonizers Bundle!

name: Terraformers + Starward Rogue: Mechs and Colonizers Bundle
description: Colonize Red Planet or fight in a mech - Mechs and Colonizers Bundle!

name: Rogue Stargun
description: Rogue Stargun is an action-packed space combat sim where you pilot 5 unique starfighters with interactive VR cockpits in a story-driven single player campaign consisting of over 24 unique missions covering both land and space.

name: Computer Fury
description: Offline fighting game like 3rd person challenging fighting game, you can very easily make your any special move or difficult move during fight with any simple keyboard, using keyboard is more fun than x box game pad or pc game pad, but with x box game pad or pc game pad added vibration system

name: ZenFire
description: Very casual click and shoot with some little minigames, reach 20k points to beat the game!

name: Mudoku: Next Sudoku
description: Move + Sudoku = Mudoku !! Mudoku is addictive puzzle based on Sudoku.

name: Legally Distinct, Planetary Based, Suika Game Clone
description: Merge the planets to increase your score, keep merging to increase your combo and multiply your points beyond the stars.

name: In the Grace of Our Malice
description:
Bee receives a call from a friend in need. They're estranged, but there's a bond that won't go away; for better and for worse.

In the Grace of our Malice is an old-school, linear Visual Novel made in roughly a week by kiri and merengedoll.

name: Target Rush
description: A bite-sized platformer where you have to break as many targets as you can within the time limit.

name: Hole io: Party Animals
description: Sin descripción

name: Cooking Arena Pizza Yolo
description: Sin descripción

name: Woodturning 3D: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: DIY Paper Doll: Stylish Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Hidden Cats in Berlin
description: HALLO! Our cats are now in the awesome city of Berlin! Let's search for them. A short and pleasant experience in a big and lovely illustration! Start with a Beautiful monochromatic scenario, relax, and find all the cats to reveal the final colored art.

name: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Boats
description: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Boats is an casual puzzel game with stunning images in the synthwave style. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: Potato Salad
description: Play as 1 of 7 potatoes spanning generations and genres in your quest to defeat the King of Spudtown once and for all.
