name: Kotoko's a Little Weird
description: After years of stress from trying to act perfect, Kotoko decides to throw out her old way of thinking, and be herself.

name: Dog Racing: Lovely Pet Friends Paw
description: Race, Customize, Conquer – with your loyal furry friend by your side!

name: How Heavy Are My Nuts?
description: Do your Steam friends think you're too normal? Do you need a status that'll spice up their life? Introducing "How Heavy Are My Nuts?" The Game. Have the time of your life explaining this one to your father when he inevitably walks in on you playing it.

name: Twilight Manor
description: Twilight Manor: Roguelite FPS is a bloody and brutal shooter game that features beautiful cutscenes, jaw-dropping map design and an upgrade system you can carry over into Newgame+! Uncover the secret behind the mansion as you battle through bosses and enemies with a wide arsenal of weapons

name: Truck and Forklift Logistic Simulator
description: Dive into Truck and Forklift Logistic Simulator, mastering logistics with your vehicles. Deliver cargo, conquer challenges, and redefine transportation in this dynamic simulator!

name: Discrete Heart
description: Discrete Heart is an emotion-building game in a 2D pixel style from a top-down perspective. Joy, trust, fear... Each initial emotion corresponds to different initial attributes and props. "Inject" and control the characters to build 8 basic emotions, looking for the answer named "Unintentionaler".

name: Waking Tides
description: Welcome to "Waking Tides," a small but captivating atmospheric adventure game that thrives on experimentation. Delve into a world where augmented reality extends your gameplay, seamlessly blurring the lines between reality and fantasy.

name: Grim Realms
description: A side scrolling, pixel art, survival colony fantasy sim: Guide your villagers as they struggle to stay alive in a world overrun by the undead.

name: Quetzal
description: Quetzal is the ultimate indie deck builder based on Aztec mythology.

name: Lady in Midnight
description:
“The moment I see you, I want to do this… slowly and deeply, feeling every embrace.”

After getting lost due to a carriage accident, I was led by a dangerous-looking man into a mansion…

“If you don’t want to be tormented every night, you’d better listen to me.”

name: Dziedzic: A Book of Unanswered Questions
description:
The family gathering is for Miłosz Dajski an opportunity to meet family members he hasn't seen for a long time. While wandering around the palace he hasn't been to for years, he encounters a man who is claiming to be his cousin, however Miłosz can't seem to recall him.

The awkward encounter soon turns into horror when the mysterious relative finally announces "someone is plotting an attack." At the same time, there is a dispute between the descendants of the family head over inheritance issue and who will take over the leadership. Does this have anything to do with the "planned attack"?

name: Doom 2 In City Only
description: Doom 2 In City Only is a 36 map megawad in MBF21 format featuring nothing but city maps. Some of these maps are very large, so it is recommended you play with OpenGL. The set was primarily tested in dsda-doom. There are 6 secret maps (one per episode) with the secret exit being in the middle map of each episode. Jumping and freelook are not intended for this set and will break some maps.

name: Banzai Escape 2: Subterranean - KTactical
description: Collaboration Work with KTactical x Xenoaisam Studio. KTactical costumes of K-chan and G-Chan

name: Liquidum: Femme Fatale
description: A level pack with 10 new levels for Liquidum, a water-themed logic puzzle game.

name: Dumb Ways to Survive
description: Collect, harvest and hunt your way through the wilderness as a bumbling bean trying to stay alive. Will you die a dummy or use your smarts to survive?

name: Shardfall: FitQuest VR
description:
Beautiful Worlds, Endless Enemies, and Unlimited Exploration.
Take on a huge range of fierce enemies with different fighting styles. Attack with powerful jabs, crosses, hooks and uppercuts. Defend yourself with blocks, jumps, ducks and dodges. Think and adapt to survive.

name: Who Wants to Be A Millionaire: The Smurfs DLC Pack
description: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: The Smurfs

name: Weedcraft Inc + Bio Inc. Redemption: Medical Herbs Bundle
description: Explore medical influence of weed and cure patients!

name: Tiny Gems Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Oh Chute!
description:
You are Ron Danger, stunt person and extreme sports enthusiast. You just can’t get enough of sky-diving, but the local helicopter pilots have had it with your antics and are out to get you… It’s up to you to show them who’s boss!

Choose one of four different levels of varying difficulty and see how long you can survive. Sky-diving is hard enough alone, but those darned pilots aren’t going to make it any easier for you. Keep an eye on their movement and choose the right time to open your ‘chute and manoeuvre to one of the designated landing zones.

name: Hold The Noise
description: Listen to beautiful and captivating noises! It will be truly amazing. Are you ready to hear some great noise? Just press and hold the space bar. Are you really ready now?

name: Gnosis
description: A dark atmospheric test that asks you to see things in new ways, including the experience of playing itself. In this love letter to flash horror, explore 60 ending permutations and reactivity to your answers, as the game not only allows but implores you to play and break it how you see fit.

name: Rhythm & Beats
description: Get into the groove of the beat with Rhythm & Beats. Focused on VR play but supports keyboard and mouse. Play to your favorite songs or playlist with 5 levels of difficulty.

name: Sudoku Constellation
description: Sudoku gives a sense of calm, relaxation, and resonance with the universe, relieving stress, reducing anxiety, and helping players reconnect to their inner peace. Gameplay Description: Just keep the 'numbers' or 'constellations' in each row, column, and house without repeating.

name: Next Room
description: It is a single-player 3D scene puzzle type game that interacts with objects in a room from a first-person perspective to find a way to the next room. The game is made up of high-quality models, bright skies and warm sunlight, so find your way to the next room in this cozy room!

name: Rest to Landia
description: Resttolandia: A thrilling adventure as you embody a determined streamer aiming for the top. Master precision jumps, dodge obstacles, and climb closer to streaming stardom. Can you reach the summit and join the elite? Jump into action now!

name: Song of Yosef
description: Song of Yosef is a Metroidvania platformer with wacky enemies and fun physics.

name: Boink
description: Boink! A game about falling money and building bouncers to increase the money. Purchase bouncers and place them on the map. Upgrade bouncers and the cannon to boost value. Rebirth to gain unique upgrades. Watch your money grow!

name: Real Life
description: Survive the dungeon and return to the tavern with loot to go farther, or die alone and lose everything.

name: Stickman Jailbreak 2024
description: Are You Ready to Unlock the Secrets?

name: Sherlock Purr 2
description: Join Sherlock Purr on a purrfect adventure!

name: Hyper Turbo Boost
description: Sin descripción

name: No Internet
description: This game is based upon the dinosaur jumping over cacti game which one gets in the web browser Google Chrome which can be played when there is no internet connection available.

name: Ace Angler
description: A little fishing game for the Playdate.

name: Emoji-Connect
description: The aim of the game is to score as many points as possible by mixing emojis of the same type before time runs out. When two emojis are combined, you get time. The bigger the combination, the more time you get. This way, the best players can extend the game indefinitely.

name: Arcane Chaos
description: Immerse yourself in Arcane Chaos, the ultimate magic-fueled roguelike. Mastering chaotic spells to vanquish endless waves of foes. Level up, enhance your powers, and experiment with fusing spells to unlock a myriad of potent combinations. Can you navigate the relentless chaos and emerge victorious?

name: Dice-Zee!: Dice Pak - "Gold & Pearls"
description: Adds six brand new dice sets for rolling all those hard-to-roll numbers in Dice-Zee! Maybe they won't add any luck, but at least you'll do it in style!

name: Infantry Attack
description:
Soldier! War is coming and duty calls!
Enemies are invading our country and we need YOU to defend it!

name: Ecchi Paradise: Kinky Chicks
description: Sin descripción

name: Ecchi Paradise: Fantasy Babes
description: Sin descripción

name: Ecchi Paradise
description: Sin descripción

name: Capybara, Ducks, Rats and Bananas Bundle
description: This bundle contains lots of Capybara, Duck, Mouse and Banana! Get Ducky Quacky + Capybara Madness + Ratyboy Adventures + Revenge of Banana in one bundle with good price!

name: Dice-Zee!: Dice Pak - "Serene Chromas"
description: Adds six all new dice colors and designs to roll for those hard-to-roll numbers!

name: Dice-Zee!: Dice Pak - "Autumn Auras"
description: Adds six brand new dice sets to your Dice-Zee! game!

name: Dice-Zee!: Dice Pak - "Contemporary Cool"
description: Adds new brand new dice sets to your Dice-Zee! game instantly without needing to grind for DZ coins within the game!

name: Portal Dungeon: Character Pack - Hamster
description: In the world of "Portal Dungeon," a mysterious new hero suddenly appears, possessing powerful intelligence and a petite figure.

name: Samara
description: SAMARA plunges player into a first person, single player psychological survival horror game. Investigating his missing uncle's house, player encounters a disturbing doll. Through puzzles and chilling revelations , he confronts the darkness within and uncovers the horrifying truth.

name: Cozy Hamlets
description: Build, design, and relax in your very own medieval haven.

name: Hot Rider Racing Simulator
description: Fuel your need for speed. Take the lead and leave the rest in the dust.

name: Dice-Zee!
description: Dice-Zee! brings back a classic and beloved game that is popular across the world! Can you rank as one of the best dice scoring players in the world?

name: Royale Online
description:
Royale Online invites you to an enchanting MMORPG experience! The game unfolds in a thrilling universe, focusing on the epic struggle among three kingdoms. Each kingdom brings together heroes of different classes, plunging into the heart of an epic war.

As players immerse themselves in the rivalry and strategy between kingdoms, they also have the opportunity to unravel the powerful secrets of the magical stones within the game. These mystical stones, when shattered by the warriors of the kingdom, grant unique enhancements. Heroes steadfastly breaking the stones can gain superiority over their enemies, elevating their kingdoms and altering the course of the war.

Royale Online offers an unforgettable MMORPG experience with its impressive graphics, rich storyline, and strategic depth. Take part in the epic struggle between kingdoms, guiding characters with unique abilities, acquiring powerful allies, and discovering the power of magical stones. Royale Online calls you to an epic adventure – join the war between kingdoms and write your legend!

name: My Bestie is a Femboy Streamer
description: Your bestie is a Streamer. You've asked him before, but he always remains elusive on the matter...

name: Bloody Hallowfest
description: What starts as the preparation for a special Halloween night event at a summer camp turns into a nightmare when someone with a bloodied axe ends the lives of all your friends. Will you manage to escape and save yourself?

name: Olive
description: Play as Olive, a sprightly old lady, to collect gems and progressively fill the scene with colour in this arcade runner style game. Grow plants with the coins you collect, unlock new abilities, and collect outfits to customise your look.

name: Floppa: The Dark Forest
description: Find 8 pictures of cats and don't let Big Floppa catch you!

name: Guardian
description: role-playing game.You need to defend your town and destroy the enemy's castle using your own hero, who has his own powerful magic.

name: The Circle Tales: Elvenwoods
description: The Circle Tales: Elvenwoods is a free-to-play action-adventure game where you embark on a journey to slay a god. The very first game by Studio Castor, set in a medieval high fantasy open world.

name: The One
description: The One is a game in which your goal will be alone or in a group of up to four players to explore the world three years after the zombie apocalypse. However, it's not only zombies that will prove to be a problem, but also others who have managed to survive this time behind the gates of the bunkers.

name: Dusty the Lazy Cat
description: Dusty the Lazy Cat is a puzzle game where the main character Dusty goes through different worlds and levels. He must also deal with enemies and solve puzzles.

name: Orion Haste
description: Run and gun through 7 levels of alien-infested mayhem to save mankind from annihilation! Shoot enemies with powerful weapons, defeat colossal bosses, and even race to beat your best time in this nostalgic platform shooter. As a human soldier stationed on a military fort in outer space, you must answer the distress signal emanating from a nearby planet. It’s time to channel your inner heroic retro game commando and obliterate the alien horde!

name: Find Together on Stream
description: Find Together on Stream is a chat game that you can play with your Twitch community. It's a game where chat users form words from randomly generated letters in a bowl. As a streamer, you can also create the letters of any word in your language.

name: Uradrasill
description: "Mahjong" x "Battle" A mahjong battle game that can be enjoyed like a puzzle!

name: Kamihi yori: Tokiori-hen
description: Sin descripción

name: Urban Warriors
description: A frantic 4 player arena fighting game featuring both versus & beat 'em up co-op adventure modes!

name: Rainbow Moon + Rainbow Skies Strategy RPG Bundle
description: Over 100 hours of Strategy RPG glory!

name: Out of the Park Baseball 25
description:
Out of the Park Baseball 25 marks a milestone - 25 years of sports gaming excellence!
Officially licensed by MLB, the MLB Players Inc. and KBO, this year's Anniversary Edition puts you in charge of your favorite baseball franchise. Your team, your legacy, your dynasty. Play what the pros play!

name: Blindsighted
description: Navigate a platformer using only feeling and memory, each death meaning progress. With your memory illuminating your path, you'll "see" a little more of the level each time you attempt it.

name: Grym Wonder
description: Fight tirelessly in the world of the game Grym Wonder, created in the style of power-fantasy with rogue-lite elements, where you are one on one with thousands of monsters and their leaders.

name: MLB The Show 24: MVP Edition
description:
Swing for the fences, experience game-deciding moments, become a legend and live out your baseball dreams in MLB The Show 24.

Everyone has a moment to own.
Everyone has a story to tell.

Unlock your moment. Own The Show.

name: MLB The Show 24: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Swing for the fences, experience game-deciding moments, become a legend and live out your baseball dreams in MLB The Show 24.

Everyone has a moment to own.
Everyone has a story to tell.

Unlock your moment. Own The Show.

name: Bunny Hungry
description: How's bunny? ...bunny hungry! Move the terrain around, learn how it interacts, and make a safe path from the bunny to the food in this 2D puzzle game.

name: Legends of Alterra
description: A classic RPG experience with modern strategic battle mechanics. There are over 20 classes to unlock, with the ability to assign sub-classes. Explore the world of Alterra with an array of dynamic characters, and gain allies to help turn the tides of the ongoing fight between humans and elves.

name: My Sweet Floating in the Void
description: The game is a first-person puzzle adventure, with wacky and old-fashioned graphics, which will transport the player into a dreamlike, psychedelic world composed of an experimental game system that will challenge and test even the most experienced puzzle gamers in the industry.

name: Outcast: A New Beginning - Adelpha Edition
description:
Key items of the Outcast - A New Beginning: Adelpha Edition

High-detail 24cm/9.5inch Sai statue
Exclusive collector's steelbook
Game copy
3 audio CD's soundtrack with game music
Hardcover artbook featuring over 50 pages of concept art from the game

name: PJ Masks Power Heroes: Mighty Alliance
description: Team up with the Power Heroes and rebuild PJ Power HQ.

name: Tickle Magnet
description: Make laughter, make love, make friends, and make memories in this tongue-in-cheek tickling fetish simulation. Set in modern day America, spend your sophomore year in college investigating a series of mysterious kidnappings while balancing your finances, your love life, and your school work.

name: Mind Palace
description: Explore your own notes in this experimental VR journey. Climb, jump & slide along the way on your adventure of buildung your personal mind palace. Make connections and place node-bubbles to arrange your notes in memorable places.

name: Dreamland
description: Dreamland is a world full of imagination and adventure, waiting for you to explore and discover. Join us and embark on your adventure!

name: Amygdala
description: Welcome to the world of Amygdala. Multiple nightmares await you.

name: Logiart Grimoire
description:
Logiart is a "Picture Logic Puzzle" that uses vertical and horizontal numbers as hints to complete illustrations.
It has simple and easy-to-understand rules, making it accessible for anyone to play.
Various assist functions are also included, allowing for a smooth gameplay experience.
You can also choose to turn off the assist functions if desired.

name: Pixel Royale 3D
description: Dive into Pixel Royale 3D, a pixelated FPS with 40+ weapons, intense gameplay, and customizable character skins. Engage in thrilling gunfights across 3 maps, and challenge opponents in 3 different game modes. Gear up and lock and load for the ultimate Pixelated FPS experience!

name: Under Dead
description: The dead have risen and the living have been forced to take refuge in underground bunkers. Take the role of a hero who fights the undead and saves survivors.

name: Crystal Guardians
description: Crystal Guardians is a tower defense game with rogue-like elements. Fight of waves and defend the world crystal. Gear up your towers with a powerful combination of items for your strategy. In an ever expanding map, find hidden powers and conquer the enemies.

name: Pogo Girlfriend
description: A foddy-like pogo game with a lot of heart! Play with your friends!

name: New Citizen
description: New Citizen is a modern-themed roleplay adventure game set in the vast open world of the USA. The game focuses mainly on the player, creating an environment that feels alive and that is constantly moving.

name: Pirate Dragons
description: Play a dragon in this third-person, action RPG! During the time of sailing ships and piracy, you are a dragon. Grow your hoard by joining a faction, trading goods, or becoming a pirate!

name: Outcast: A New Beginning
description: Explore the breathtaking alien world of Adelpha, support the local Talans in their struggles and fight your way through fast-paced battles against invading robot forces in this 3rd-person, open world, action adventure sequel to the 1999 cult classic.

name: Great Gun Gauntlet
description: An arcade-style highscore survival game focused on dodging obstacles and bullets to survive as long as possible while also trying to get the best high score.

name: Workshop Maps Pack
description: Map pack consisting of maps removed from the Steam Workshop by the developer.

name: Opossession
description:
Humanity has reached unparalleled heights of advancement, traversing the vast expanses of space and establishing settlements across the cosmos. With a staggering population of 400 quadrillion souls, our species has become ubiquitous throughout the universe. This era of evolution has heralded the emergence of novel technologies and occupations, among them the enigmatic profession of Mailmans.
These individuals navigate the expanse of the cosmos aboard spaceships reminiscent of delivery boxes, ferrying parcels and missives across the boundless reaches of space. Yet, amidst this sea of interstellar couriers, there exists a singular figure who stands apart.
A Mailman unlike any other, accompanied not by mere machinery, but by an unconventional companion—a pet opossum named BOB.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Danny Outfit Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Horror School: The Classroom
description: Say hello to the eerie world of "Horror School: A Scary School Simulator Story," a first person anime horror game set in an abandoned classrooms at midnight. As the clock strikes twelve, the corridors come alive with malevolent squad and scary playtime lurking in the shadows.

name: One Military Camp: Biomes
description: Explore new ways to organize your camp with the new versions of biomes for One Military Camp. It is now possible to choose any of the five biomes in their clear version.

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: It's a Night Magic the Arrival of Spring All In Pack
description: CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 It's a Night Magic the Arrival of Spring ALL in Pack is a set that combines somewhat mature costumes and events. This pack will help you feel more open with the arrival of spring. 7 Costume Sets 2 Hairstyles 2 Events

name: Shields Defend
description: Sin descripción

name: For Honor: Battle Bundle – Year 8 Season 1
description: The Y8S1 Battle Bundle grants access to 100 tiers of rewards plus 25 tiers of progression for both battle and legacy pass.

name: Girls & Sweets: Chapter 2
description: A continuation of the story of the difficult relationship between two sisters.

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - The Son of Gunpowder
description: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary Weapons, and one Legendary Consumable: The Conspirator (Hunter), Crown Cinders (Martini-Henry IC1), Royal Sabotage (Scottfield Model 3), Forefather’s Fury (Vitality Shot).

name: Hentai Milf
description: Relax with the beautiful girls and collect them all. A great solution after a busy day!

name: Reborn: Episode 1 - New Life
description: Reborn is a choice-based visual novel for adults centered on the life of a teenager in college. Become a student at the most prestigious college on the continent and experience all the delights of college life! Sex, humor, romance, drama and deep plot. All this is waiting for you in the game Reborn!

name: For a Vast Future: Colour Palette 9
description: Sin descripción

name: Flashing Lights: Beast Swat Truck DLC
description: Strengthen your police department forces with the Beast Swat Truck DLC!

name: Cartel Tycoon: Content Pack - Diva's Hotel
description: Hire a charming Camila, adorn your empire with unique emblems, and elevate your operations with an exclusive hotel skin!

name: DJMax Respect V: Falcom Pack
description: DJMAX RESPECT V - Falcom PACK! Now enjoy the songs of Falcom in DJMAX RESPECT V.

name: Ride 5: Free Pack 06
description: Break the mold with RIDE 5 - Free Pack 06 - don't miss out on two reckless naked bikes!

name: Gunvolt Records Cychronicle: Song Pack 4
description:
Add 4 Lola tracks from the Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX series to GUNVOLT RECORDS: Cychronicle!

This song pack for Lola adds the tracks "Raison d'Etre", "Search Light", "Beyond Probability" and "Love's Sanctuary"

name: Marine School Simulator
description: School life experience on island in the tropical sea... with Flying Shark! Go to school, play with friends in town, and exterminate dangerous creatures. Experience the life of a student on a mysterious southern island.

name: Let's Battle Online
description: Action online game Three-player battle for the win! Win by knocking your opponent off the field or reducing their HP to 0! 1 vs 1 single mode 2 vs 2 cooperative multiplayer mode In the cooperative multiplayer mode, you can fight together with your friends!

name: Fast Beat Battle Rider
description: I will be entitled "the fastest"! Slip between the cars that try to block you on your motorbike and run through the highway in a "super-highspeed-battle'' just like in movies! The more you use the machine, the higher the status will be. Improve your skills and defeat the first Ghost Rider!

name: Stop10
description:
STOP10 is an arcade game that mixes fast reflexes with simple sums.

Your objective is to make the counter and the moving number to sum 10. However, the counter is rapidly moving so you'll have to be quick and sharp! The faster you answer, the more points you get!

The counter has a timer which refills when you get a correct answer and drops when you miss. If it drops to 0, it's game over!

name: Who Wants to Be a Murderer?
description: Who Wants to Be a Murderer? is a psychological horror game set in a TV game show straight out of the 90s. You'll face a series of challenges that will put your morality and sanity to the test.

name: Bootleg Soldier Azure: Astral Rave
description:
Bootleg Soldier Azure: Astral Rave stars one-time wonder Yuuto Ichika in her quest to get her cookbook back while shooting down everything that tries to stop her in this fast-paced shoot 'em up!

This game was made for the Magical Girl Game Jam #9, and is a fan work of LAME Dimension's characters and games!

name: Wild Card Football: Legacy RB Pack
description: Play as famed legacy Running Backs Marshawn Lynch, Marshall Faulk, and Emmitt Smith, along with their unique Wild Card outfits.

name: Idle Spiral: Custom Spiral Pack
description: Support the endless spiraling adventure of Idle Spiral with this exclusive DLC pack!

name: Creation of a God
description: The game mixes elements of platforming, puzzles and combat in a tormented world ruled by a mysterious God. Only the most daring will be able to move forward and conquer the golden crown!

name: Museum Mystery
description: Museum Mystery is a deck-building, story-driven roguelite adventure where museum exhibits come to life, wreaking chaos. Explore halls from different eras, battle works of art, collect your own deck of artifacts, and solve the mystery!

name: Secret Odyssey: Orb of Eternity
description: Embark on a journey through the Quantum Complex, where ancient wisdom and futuristic puzzles collide. Navigate through hidden chambers and cryptic challenges to unveil a secret that binds reality and technology. Master intricate puzzles, unlock the mysteries, and discover the power of the cyber orb.

name: Sea of Thieves: 2024 Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Bing In Wonderland: Deluxe Edition
description: A Roguelite monster killing satisfaction galore without any exploration elements. The game is filled to the brim with exotic enemies and stages with a collection of deep and robust boons, weapons, and items plus an abundance of pointless features and useless details.

name: Sea of Thieves: 2024 Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cartel Tycoon: Deluxe Edition
description: Cartel Tycoon is a survival business sim inspired by the ‘80s narco trade.

name: WorldNeverland: Berry Donut Fair
description: Sin descripción

name: Fortunate Duo: Kyouun Youhei to Houseki no Hime-kishi
description: Humanity was considered weak compared to other species. The princess knight and the mercenary rise up to defeat the Demon King.

name: ToyBox Easter
description: The Easter toys are everywhere! Can you fit them all into the toybox? ToyBox Easter has many colourful levels guaranteed to challenge your critical thinking!

name: Re:Cento
description: Sin descripción

name: Darkness and Flame
description: A story of a young girl involved in the battle between Darkness and Flame.

name: Arcade Archives: Mouser
description:
"MOUSER" is an action game released by UPL in 1983.
Take control of the tomcat Nyanta and rescue his lover Mariya from her mouse captors!
The tricky mice will come at you with all sorts of surprises.
Nyanta will need all your luck and help to make it back with his fiancée!

name: Around The World: Travel To Brazil - Collector's Edition
description: An unforgettable vacation in Brazil.

name: For a Vast Future: Platinum Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Beauties Unveiled: Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: MechWarrior 5: Mercenaries - Solaris Showdown
description: Join Duncan Fisher in a race against time to thwart the overthrow of the Solaris Council, discover the new Loader King 'Mech, collect 11 new Gladiator 'Mech variants, select new weapons and equipment tailored for close-quarter engagements, and help save the very future of Solaris

name: Air Stacky
description:
Air Stacky is a casual balancing game. Take control of Stacky, a drone tasked with gathering boxes of various sizes !

This game was part of a game jam called "TobuJam 3".

name: Jolly Chimp Champ
description: In this action puzzler for the Playdate, the crank controls the game's elements which you must use to navigate the stubborn, sedentary chimp to the goal of each level.

name: For Honor: Ultimate Edition
description: Choose the Ultimate Edition which includes 12 additional heroes with unique playstyles to get the best experience in For Honor!

name: Ivri
description: IVRI immerses players in a gripping space adventure where they navigate an eerie, abandoned space station, meticulously piecing together the puzzle of the missing crew and uncovering the enigmatic secrets hidden within the ship's walls, delivering an enthralling narrative experience.

name: Strange Parallel: Sele
description: Nothing can stop those destined to meet.Cherish the opportunity given by God and fall in love with every "her" in parallel time and space.This candy contains love, keep it sweet~~~~~

name: Tutel Quest
description: After passing out from a rough night, Vedal is suddenly awakened by Neuro calling out for help. Before he can figure out what to do, a hand reaches out from his screen and pulls him into the digital world, then quickly loses its grasp. Vedal and Neuro have now lost one another, trapped somewhere on the Internet. Play as Vedal, navigating your way through a strange world full of traps and puzzles. Can you help him find Neuro?

name: Drive Beyond Horizons
description: Rev up your engines and venture into the unknown with Drive Beyond Horizons! Conquer dynamic landscapes, customize your ride, and unearth hidden treasures. Get ready for heart-pounding challenges and endless excitement. Your adventure starts now !

name: The Finals: Season 2
description:
Season 2 was the second season of THE FINALS. It launched on March 14, 2024, and ended on June 13, 2024. The season followed the activities of hacker collective CNS and featured a retro gaming theme.

This season was sponsored by VAIIYA, OSPUZE, and CNS, which added an all-new arena: SYS$HORIZON.

New content introduced in Season 2 includes:
- Arena: SYS$HORIZON
- Game Modes: Power Shift, Terminal Attack
- New cosmetics
- New Battle Pass
- Weapons: 93R, FAMAS, KS-23
- Gadgets: Anti-Gravity Cube, Gateway, Data Reshaper
- Specialization: Dematerializer
- Game show event: Retro Invasion 82
- Progression: Circuits, new career levels
- Private matches

name: Ethel
description: Immerse yourself in a unbelievable, story-rich mystery, packed with jaw-dropping plot twist, horror, and multiple endings. You'll need sharp observation skills. Solve tricky puzzles and navigate eerie environments without any hand-holding.

name: Hive In Space
description: A black hole threatens to engulf the solar system. Humanity is migrating aboard a spacecraft. You play as the chief engineer and must overcome anomalies & hallucinations to keep the ship stable.

name: Escape Game The Abandoned Hospital
description:
Something is wrong with the hospital they brought me to.
I have a bad feeling about this...
I have to get out of here as soon as possible...

name: Eggconsole Ys II PC-8801mkIISR
description: A grand story unfolds in the ancient kingdom of Ys. The raging development that unravels the many settings inherited from the previous title is a must-see!

name: Balloony
description: Roll, jump and fly through Balloony's adventures! For 1-4 Players

name: Simple Number-Based Color Sense IQ Test
description: Master Your Color Sense and Challenge the Time Limit! Quick and Artistic Brain Training Quiz for Play

name: Not Alone in the Space
description: "Not Alone in the Space" is a visual novel for adults only. Young pilot Avis and his two adorable female partners explore space. What they encounter will turn their minds inside out, forcing them to break the chain of command and expose their inner desires.

name: Rescue: The Beagles
description: A challenging retro arcade platformer/runner with unique parallax based gameplay. Rescue adorable doggies from an evil biohazard brigade in an intense, fast paced parkour through colorful procedurally generated levels.

name: Find Cats With Friends
description: Find Cats With Friends - gather friends, search the island for 100 mischievous cats, and bring them back in this cooperative multiplayer quest!

name: Acorn Cop
description: Based on a true story, Acorn Cop is a meme game where you shoot all the acorns, but do NOT shoot any human or other living things. Enjoy and collect easter egg items. Can you do just that for 20 minutes?

name: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition - Victors and Vanquished
description: Embark on a thrilling journey with "Victors and Vanquished"! In nineteen epic scenarios, play as Ragnar Lothbrok, Oda Nobunaga, Charlemagne, and more. Your strategy and choices decide your fate: Secure your pre-order now and be prepared to conquer the battlefield!

name: Spellarium 3
description: Spellarium 3 is one of our first games in the Match 3 Puzzle genre. The keyword is 'Puzzle,' which means that sometimes (not always!) you'll complete the level faster by removing objects in the correct order.

name: Dream Escape
description: Players will be thrown into a variety of frightening scenarios, trying to find clues and avoid deadly traps in order to escape the dream alive.

name: The Dawn Of A Flower
description: "She became a prince to survive." Historical materials of ancient Egypt Fusion fantasy romance game "The Dawn Of A Flower"

name: The Nightmare Accord
description: A single player or coop game experience that pits players in the world of nightmares as a customizable child conquering their fears!

name: The Singing Saw Simulator
description: Dive into the sensational world of Singing Saw Simulator - a rythm game with a twist! (Or should that be a bend?) Unleash your inner virtuoso as you soar, swoop, sing, and shred your way to your next musical masterpiece in this pulsing, two-tone, musical performance of a lifetime.

name: The Scarlet Chaos
description: Join Detective Haerrison and his partner on a case involving a supernatural killer and a haunting entity called the Hat Man. Along the way, take on side quests and explore the semi-open world of Kelaura in this dark turn based RPG adventure.

name: Tokyo School Girl
description: Use Souls-Like combat with a sword, gun, or your hands in this epic Third-Person adventure in the open world city of Tokyo to defeat the powerful ruler named Lion Knight and save your sister who is destined to save the city from destruction.

name: Darkness Machine
description: Darkness Machine Game is a sword fight and shooting. Shoot by auto gun and Missile. Players will control a character that can use sword , auto Gun or missile to destroy enemy. Player can change to power body. Makes the attack harder. Can fly and shoot rockets. Age 18+ Only

name: California Swingers Club: Season 1 - Sea Swap
description: Two couples rent a spacious sailboat for the perfect vacation, but as they venture out onto the water, their journey takes an unexpected turn.

name: Strange
description: The main character, who moves to another city, finds himself in unexpected mysterious events when her new friend disappears.

name: Fantastical Mystery ADV: Ultimate Jumbo Jet Murder Case
description: A novel game featuring the popular streamer group "Ultimate Jumbo Jet"! Search for clues and discover the truth through "Fantastical Mystery"!

name: Escape from Andromeda
description: Escape from Andromeda is an overhead 2D sci-fi spaceship looter shooter based in a procedurally generated galaxy. In Escape from Andromeda, every planet is a level, and every star is a part of your story.

name: Super Kye
description: **Super Kye** is a puzzle adventure with unique challenges and a level editor. Navigate mazes, solve puzzles, and unlock levels in a game where strategy meets creativity.

name: Sigils
description: Sigils is a stylized Action Strategy Magic Cards adventure where you create powerful sigil guardians and grow stronger as you progress through the treacherous environment.
